      • diagonalSumInSpiral

        protected static long diagonalSumInSpiral(int n)
        Note: This is a brute force solution. This method is used to calculate the sum of all diagonal number of a spiral of any size. e.g: 21 22 23 24 25 20 7 8 9 10 19 6 1 2 11 18 5 4 3 12 17 16 15 14 13
        Parameters:
        n - Size of spiral. One side of spiral.
        Returns:
        The sum of the diagonal values of the spiral.

      • isNarcissisticNumber

        protected static boolean isNarcissisticNumber(int n)
        Narcissistic Number is a number whose sum of it's digits, raised to the power of the number of digits, equals the number.
        Parameters:
        n - The integer to be tested.
        Boolean - True if n is a Narcissistic Number.
        Returns:
        Boolean Indicating whether a number is Narcissistic number(true) or not(false);

        Parameters:
        n - The integer whose digits have to be raised to a power.
        power - The power to which each digit of n is raised.
        Returns:
        The sum of all digits after their raised to power.
